verses.kjv: Behold, bless ye the LORD, all ye servants of the LORD, which by night stand in the house of the LORD.
verses.ct: Come, praise the LORD, all you who serve the LORD, you who stand watch in the LORD's house during the night.

verses.kjv: Lift up your hands in the sanctuary, and bless the LORD.
verses.ct: Raise your hands in the holy place and praise the LORD.

verses.kjv: The LORD that made heaven and earth bless thee out of Zion.
verses.ct: May the LORD, who made heaven and earth, bless you from Zion.
